word_mean_info__list.difference: 往往着重说明与同类事物不同的个别事物。如：The visitors admired his paintings, but particularly the portrait of his daughter.(来访者赞赏他所有的绘画，特别是他女儿的画像。)
一般表示某事物在意义、程度、重要性性超过其他事物。如：I love Italy, especially in summer.(我喜欢意大利，尤其在夏天。)
多表示“专门地”，“为特别目的的地”，如表“不寻常”，“过分”等，可与especially通用。如：I made chocolate cake specially for you.(我特地为你做了巧克力 蛋糕。)

bilingual.source: Especially as you went on your own.
Keep calm, especially when you are with other people.
bilingual.target: 保持冷静，尤其是当你和其他人在一起时。

bilingual.source: The Spring Festival in China, especially the dinner on the Lunar New Year's Eve!
bilingual.target: 中国的春节，尤其是除夕夜的晚餐！

bilingual.source: Learning idioms can be fun, especially when we compare them to Chinese equivalents.
bilingual.target: 学习成语可以很有趣，尤其是当我们将它们与中文等价词进行比较时。
我喜欢运动，尤其是篮球。

bilingual.source: She is afraid of bugs, especially spiders.
bilingual.target: 她害怕小虫，尤其是蜘蛛。
我喜欢所有水果，尤其是芒果。
我喜欢所有的水果，尤其是苹果。

bilingual.source: This dish is delicious, especially the sauce.
bilingual.target: 这道菜很好吃，尤其是酱汁。
我喜欢意大利菜，尤其是意大利面。

list.abstract: especially（[ɪˈspeʃəli]），英语单词，作副词用，为尤其；特别；格外。短语搭配有especially concerned（特别关注），例句为“Especially, the river's Chinese paddlefish has died out.（尤其是这条河的中华白鲟已经灭绝了）”。 especially副词类近义词有peculiarly、notably。

yingyinNormal.en: And I especially wanna thank my wife.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我尤其想感谢我的妻子。

yingyinNormal.en: Temple Fairs became especially popular during the Qing Dynasty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 庙会在清朝尤其盛行。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone loves playing football, especially when it's muddy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家都喜欢踢足球，尤其是当地上有泥的时候。

yingyinNormal.en: I love fire engines, especially when they make muddy puddles.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我非常喜欢消防车，尤其是它帮我们浇出了泥坑！

yingyinNormal.en: Charming, smart, and very skilled at combat. Especially in water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他迷人，聪明，战术技巧非常高超，尤其在水中。

yingyinNormal.en: Especially here in Gaffney.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尤其是在加夫尼。

yingyinNormal.en: You want to endorse a winner, especially one you appointed to his position.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想支持一个赢家，尤其是你任命的人。

yingyinNormal.en: I appreciate your coming here in person. Especially during the, final rush.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我感谢你亲自过来，尤其在这最后冲刺阶段。

yingyinNormal.en: Hurray. Everyone loves going on the bus, especially Goldie the fish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太好啦！大家都喜欢坐公共汽车，尤其是金鱼金金。

yingyinNormal.en: I knew you were a danger to me right from the off. Especially after Halloween.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一开始就知道你是个威胁，尤其万圣节之后。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yeah. Swimmingly. Especially the blue one. He went in his little house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，如鱼得水，尤其是那条蓝色的，它游进自己的小鱼窝了。

yingyinNormal.en: I want to know what's going on. No one just gets as good as you do. Especially you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要知道究竟怎么回事，没有人能进步如此神速尤其是你。

yingyinNormal.en: Especially not some jerk who never had the guts to try to be anything more than a Pawpsicle hustler.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尤其是个没胆量的混球，只知道智取爪子冰棍。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sure he doesn't mean to come here and make threats. Especially during a Water Truce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我敢肯定，他到这儿来不是耍威风，尤其是在枯水休战期。

yingyinNormal.en: You should expect an increase in body hair, especially on your face, chest, armpits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这一时期，身体会出现毛发的增长，尤其在脸部，胸部，腋窝。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm good, Will. And it's always good to see you, especially in such a triumphant state.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很好，威尔，见到你总是很高兴，尤其是在这胜利的氛围中。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. Monica, what did you mean before when you said you didn't want to talk to anyone, especially me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是什么意思，当你说你不想和任何人谈，尤其是我？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, look at all of you. You're all very deeply beautiful. Especially you, Farkle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看，你们所有人，你们内心深处全都那么美，尤其是你，法尔科。

yingyinNormal.en: So your assignment today is to wash a car, together. With him? Especially with him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你们今天的任务是齐心协力洗辆车。跟他一起？尤其要跟他一起。

yingyinNormal.en: Something that a Republican-controlled Congress will never do. Especially in a VA hospital.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果共和党控制了国会，这就无法实现，尤其是在退伍军人医院。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 尤其; 特别; 格外

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: very much; more than usual or more than other people or things
sense_info_list.zh: 尤其; 特别; 格外

examination_example.sentence: The losers, said retail analyst Neil Saunders, are online-only retailers, <highlight>especially</highlight> smaller ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 零售分析师尼尔·桑德斯说，输家是只在网上销售的零售商，尤其是规模较小的零售商。

examination_example.sentence: But increasingly the story is about the plummeting prices of renewables, <highlight>especially</highlight> wind and solar.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而人们谈论更多的则是再生能源的价格大幅下跌，特别是风能和太阳能。

examination_example.sentence: President Trump has underlined fossil fuels — <highlight>especially</highlight> coal — as the path to economic growth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 特朗普总统强调化石燃料，尤其是煤炭——是经济增长的必由之路。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: used to single out one person, thing, or situation over all others

examination_example.sentence: What is <highlight>especially</highlight> important for those working in a small company?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于在小公司工作的人来说，什么特别重要？

examination_example.sentence: Your novel is about soldiers and it focuses on their relationships, <highlight>especially</highlight> the bond between sons and mothers and men and their wives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的小说是关于士兵的，关注他们的关系，尤其是儿子和母亲、男人和妻子之间的关系。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Especially</highlight> since journalism is one job robots will never do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 特别是由于新闻业是机器人将永远做不到的工作。

examination_example.sentence: This was <highlight>especially</highlight> true for younger people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一点在年轻人中更为突出。

examination_example.sentence: The limited research conducted thus far indicates they're <highlight>especially</highlight> dominant among those who value independence over cooperation, and harmony over confrontation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，进行中的有限研究表明，在那些看重独立而不是合作、看重和谐而不是对抗的人中，他们尤其占优势。

word_usage.usage: especially的基本意思是“尤其，特别”，在句中多放在它所修饰的那个词的前面。如果especially放在句首，句子要倒装。
由于especially在逻辑上已有极限意义，故无比较等级。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: used to single out one person; thing; or situation over all others

examination_example.sentence: Because of the imbalance in marriage markets, <highlight>especially</highlight> in older ages, divorced men have more choices among prospective partners than divorced women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于婚姻市场的失衡问题，尤其是在年龄较大的人群中，离异男性在寻找未来伴侣时比离异女性有更多的选择。

examination_example.sentence: "It's certainly new territory, <highlight>especially</highlight> as home security cameras become easier to install, " says Lizzie Post, president of the Emily Post Institute, America's foremost manners advisers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国最杰出的礼仪顾问 Emily Post Institute 的主席 Lizzie Post 说：“这肯定是一个新的领域，尤其是在家庭安全摄像头变得更容易安装的情况下。”

examination_example.sentence: For example, 10 bacteria or less of an <highlight>especially</highlight> deadly strain of bacteria can cause severe illness and death in people with compromised immune systems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，10个或更少的特别致命的细菌菌株，就能使免疫系统受损的人得重病和死亡。

examination_example.sentence: The latter is <highlight>especially</highlight> important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后者尤为重要。

examination_example.sentence: This is <highlight>especially</highlight> important for under-resourced schools and communities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对资源不足的学校和社区尤为重要。

word_usage.usage: especially的基本意思是“尤其，特别”，在句中多放在它所修饰的那个词的前面。如果especially放在句首，句子要倒装。
由于especially在逻辑上已有极限意义，故无比较等级。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: used to single out one person, thing, or situation over all others

examination_example.sentence: Officials were delighted with the new arrival, <highlight>especially</highlight> as black rhinos are known for being difficult to breed in captivity (圈养).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官员们对这头新犀牛的到来感到高兴，尤其是因为黑犀牛以难以在圈养中繁殖而闻名。

examination_example.sentence: She encourages people of all ages, <highlight>especially</highlight> older people, to cultivate their curiosity for life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她鼓励各个年龄段的人，尤其是老年人，培养他们对生活的好奇心。

examination_example.sentence: The only thing I didn't like is the food, <highlight>especially</highlight> the sausages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我唯一不喜欢的就是这些食物，尤其是香肠。

examination_example.sentence: The call for public engagement with the unthinkable is <highlight>especially</highlight> germane.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 呼吁公众参与不可思议的事情显得尤为重要。

examination_example.sentence: This view is <highlight>especially</highlight> evident on Kilimanjaro as climbers go through five ecosystems (生态系统)in the space of a few kilometers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种景象在乞力马扎罗山尤为明显，因为登山者要在几公里的空间内穿过五种生态系统。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 尤其; 特别; 专门地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 尤其；特别；格外；专门地；在很大程度上；很；非常

word_family.mean: adj. 特别的；特殊的；不一般的；特有的；独有的

sense_info_list.en: used to single out one person, thing, or situation over all others
sense_info_list.zh: 尤其; 特别; 专门地

examination_example.sentence: Of course it's disappointing to lose, <highlight>especially</highlight> if you are close to winning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，输了令人失望，尤其是当你快要胜利的时候。

examination_example.sentence: Blaming will make things worse, while positive words are helpful <highlight>especially</highlight> when being in trouble or in need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 责备会让事情变得更糟，而积极的话语是有帮助的，尤其是在遇到麻烦或需要帮助的时候。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Especially</highlight>, many workers are worrying that AI could make them lose their jobs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尤其是，许多工人担心人工智能会让他们失业。

examination_example.sentence: I want to <highlight>especially</highlight> thank you, Ms. Bertha, for agreeing to this interview on live television.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Bertha女士，我要特别感谢你同意接受这次电视直播的采访。

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>especially</highlight> useful for increasing flow of the lymphatic system.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她对促进淋巴系统的循环特别有效。

examination_example.sentence: When he is at the airport or on the train, he <highlight>especially</highlight> loves reading e-books.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他在机场或者火车上时，他非常喜欢读电子书。

word_usage.usage: especially的基本意思是“尤其，特别”，在句中多放在它所修饰的那个词的前面。如果especially放在句首，句子要倒装。
由于especially在逻辑上已有极限意义，故无比较等级。
